item.description:
Hi everyone!

Rudy's mom, Gail, has graciously agreed to host our next meet-up, since I will not be available. She tells us that she has an enclosed yard and an enclosed entryway for easy access (and to minimize escapes!). Should you have any questions, please be in touch with her directly: gaileckert@comcast.net

Milo and Binxy will look forward to continue their hosting in September! Hope you're each well.

All the best,
Marianna
(organizer)
item.name: August meetup at Rudy's place!
